about.description: I am a highly motivated Senior Robotics and Automation Engineering student based in Berlin, Germany, with a strong foundation in robotics, algorithm development, and practical implementation. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree at the German International University (GIU) Berlin, my focus is on advancing my expertise through my recently completed thesis, 'Road Surface Deterioration Detection Using AI, ITS, and IoT,' which earned an A+. I am currently seeking internship opportunities to contribute to innovative research, gain hands-on experience in simulation, coding, building, and design, and collaborate within dynamic, challenging environments.
